alert.note: Alert for Antelope; Burt; Cedar; Cuming; Knox; Madison; Pierce; Stanton; Thurston; Wayne (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 06 at 2:05AM CDT until October 07 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 1 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 expected. * WHERE...Burt, Antelope, Cedar, Cuming, Knox, Madison, Pierce, Stanton, Thurston, and Wayne Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from 7 AM this morning to 1 PM CDT this afternoon. For the Freeze Warning, from Midnight tonight to 9 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Antelope; Burt; Cedar; Cuming; Knox; Madison; Pierce; Stanton; Thurston; Wayne
